Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 02:54PM danmatt wrote: Dear Cc, My hair was poker straight my whole life.  I am now 13 months post-chemo and it has grown back pretty much the same.  When it first started coming in it had a little bit of wave to it, but now it is back to poker straight again.  The only difference I see is that it is a tiny bit thicker (which is a good thing for me because it was baby-fine before).  Other than that though, everything is the same...color, texture, etc. Hope this helps.  Good luck!!
Posts.Title: does everyone get curly hair after chemo? cc01 lago
